name: Inappropriate tribunal
text: §576B-306  Inappropriate tribunal.  If a petition or comparable pleading is received by an inappropriate tribunal of this State, that tribunal shall forward the pleading and accompanying documents to an appropriate tribunal of this State or another state and notify the petitioner where and when the pleading was sent. [L 1997, c 295, pt of §1; am L 2015, c 77, pt of §1]
